comment.author: 32402012@N05
comment._content: Note sign, partially obscured behind telephne pole, "Turnpike South". This must be a bridge over 95. There's no traffic visible on 95. Is it not yet open? Yet there's the sign, directing traffic to it. Is the cut so deep that traffic would not be visible?

comment.author: 15705594@N00
comment._content: The Turnpike opened on July 1, 1958, so, yes, it was open and yes, the cut is deep enough at 7th Street that you wouldn't see the traffic.
